system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging

Participant Setup Instrument
The survey instrument that triggers the survey portal. This form contains the randomization group, emails, phones and start dates

Participant Setup Event Name
Name of event where 'Participant Setup' form is enabled.

Save Target Instrument
If this field is specified, after the Participant Setup Instrument is populated, the fields will be saved to this instrument and the save record hook will be called.
If using the default RSP forms, this form should be RSP Participant Info Instrument

Phone Field
Field where phone is recorded for this participant (to be used for survey invites/reminders

Email Field
Field where email is recorded for this participant (to be used for survey invtes/reminders
<b>Participant Level: Randomized and Enrolled to Treatment.

Baseline Date Field
This TEXT field is the date that corresponds to the Baseline Start Date

Class Date Field
This TEXT field is the date that corresponds to the Class Date

Main Config Event Name
Name of event where 'RSP Participant Info' form is enabled.

Main Config Form Name
Name of form where config fields are stored

Config Field
This TEXT field that contains the Survey config id (i.e. baseline_dailies, followup_dailies

Stop Baseline Dailies Checkbox Field
The CHECKBOX field that disables baseline dailies

Stop Followup Dailies Checkbox Field
The CHECKBOX field that disables followup dailies

Disable Email Checkbox Field
The CHECKBOX field that disables emails for the dailies

Disable SMS Checkbox Field
The CHECKBOX field that disables sms for the dailies

Auto-create RSP Participant instances Field
This checkbox field to trigger auto creation of RSP Participant Instances

Baseline Dailies Form Name
Name of final form in Baseline Surveys

Baseline Dailies Event Name
Name of event for Baseline Surveys

Baseline Dailies Count Field
Name of field to capture the count of Baseline Surveys

Baseline Dailies GC Date Field
Name of field to capture the end date of Baseline Surveys

Followup Dailies Form Name
Name of final form in Followup Surveys

Followup Dailies Event Name
Name of event for Followup Surveys

Followup Dailies Count Field
Name of field to capture the count of Followup Surveys

Followup Dailies GC Date Field
Name of field to capture the end date of Followup Surveys

Followup Dailies Invite Date Field
Name of field to capture the invite date to the Followup Surveys portal

Followup Dailies Invite Sent Field
Name of field to capture timestamp Followup Surveys portal invite send

Send Portal Invite
Send email invitation with portal url.

Portal Notification Email Subject
When a participant is added to the project, they will receive an email to notify them of their personal portal url.


You can edit the suggested default.

Portal Notification From Email
When a participant is added to the project, they will receive an email to notify them of their personal portal url.


You can edit the suggested default.

Portal Notification Email Body
When a participant is added to the project, they will receive an email to notify them of their personal portal url.

You can use piping to customize this message and use the special tag [portal-url] for the link.

You can edit the suggested default.

Label for Portal URL link
Display a clickable hyperlink rather than the full url.

For example, enter 'Personal Portal' to have the survey displayed as a hyperlink on 'Personal Portal'

If left blank, the full url of the personal portal will be displayed in the email (i.e. https://redpca.stanford.edu/...
